list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a mark, object, or figure formed by two short intersecting lines or pieces (+ or ×).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cut a cross in the bark with a sharp knife
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cắt một cây thánh giá trong vỏ cây với một con dao sắc nhọn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an upright post with a transverse bar, as used in antiquity for crucifixion.
an animal or plant resulting from crossbreeding; a hybrid.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một cây thánh giá Devon và Holstein

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a pass of the ball across the field toward the center close to one's opponents' goal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Beckham's low cross was turned into the net by Cole
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thập giá thấp của Beckham bị biến thành cole

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: go or extend across or to the other side of (a path, road, stretch of water, or area).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he has crossed the Atlantic twice
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy đã vượt Đại Tây Dương hai lần

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass in an opposite or different direction; intersect.
draw a line or lines across; mark with a cross.
(of a person) make the sign of the cross in front of one's chest as a sign of Christian reverence or to invoke divine protection.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Beatie crossed herself quickly at the mention of the dead
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Beatie vượt qua bản thân mình nhanh chóng khi đề cập đến người chết

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass (the ball) across the field toward the center when attacking.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he could not get to the line to cross the ball
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta không thể đến ranh giới để vượt qua bóng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cause (an animal of one species, breed, or variety) to interbreed with one of another species, breed, or variety.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many animals of the breed were crossed with the closely related Guernsey
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều động vật của giống chó đã được lai với Guernsey liên quan chặt chẽ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: oppose or stand in the way of (someone).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không ai dám vượt qua anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: denoting movement or position across something.
describing the form or figure of a cross.
